snippet: Julius Malema, the former leader of the Youth League of the African National Congress, told the government radio that he was “not a soldier who is prepared to fall in the battle, I will die with my boots on.”
abstract: Julius Malema, the former leader of the Youth League of the African National Congress, fires back at the party that expelled him; response to expulsion is relatively muted.
lead_paragraph: Julius Malema, the former leader of the Youth League of the African National Congress, told the government radio that he was “not a soldier who is prepared to fall in the battle, I will die with my boots on.”

headline.main: South Africa: Former Youth Leader Replies to Party
headline.print_headline: South Africa: Former Youth Leader Replies to Party
